name: Queen Arda's Demesne
tagline: A multitude of tiny brooks trickle down to join the Hameth. Wafts of heady nectar drift on the breeze.

procedural.encounter_notes: Encounters are 1-in-6 likely to be with 1d4 × 10 purple sprites from the Sprite Mound

description: A multitude of tiny brooks trickle down to join the Hameth. Wafts of heady nectar drift on the breeze. Ley Line Chell: Arcane spell-casters perceive the curious dual sensation of balmy heat and biting cold. Within the Ring of Chell: True fairies are afflicted with a spiritual malaise; teleportation and summoning are ineffectual; magic of illusion or charm has a 2-in-6 chance of failure.

points_of_interest.name: Gigantic Flowers
points_of_interest.description: Around the banks of the Hameth, bounteous clusters of massive flowers (10′ tall) bloom: white and yellow lilies, reddish-pink peonies, and dark blue hibiscuses. Their deep green stalks and lurid petals create a grotesquely gorgeous tableau.
points_of_interest.interior: The air is humid and heavy with the flowers' powerful, aromatic scents, evoking strong emotions in travellers. Lilies entice with the perfume of forbidden love; peonies soothe with the half-forgotten idyll of a childhood afternoon; hibiscuses reek of mortal terror.

points_of_interest.name: Shambles
points_of_interest.description: At the centre of this hex is a glade where a charnel stench overwhelms even the powerful scents of the giant flowers.
points_of_interest.interior: Carrion, bones, and rotted entrails are scattered throughout the glade. Five human corpses hang from trees, their blood dripping into tiny bowls. Gut-spattered tables the size of playing cards and various miniature carving implements lie nearby.
points_of_interest.exploring: Characters who watch secretly may observe 1d4 × 5 purple sprites butchering their kills and transporting the constituent parts to the Sprite Mound: meat and organs bound for the sprites' kitchens, bones for the crafting workshops, and skulls planted with seeds to nourish new flowers.

points_of_interest.name: Sprite Mound
points_of_interest.description: Not far from the Shambles stands a 10′-high mound of clay that might be mistaken for nothing more than a hillock of earth. Hidden doorways lie at its base, concealed by the thick grass.
points_of_interest.entering: Hidden doorways lie at its base, concealed by the thick grass.
points_of_interest.interior: An impossibly labyrinthine complex of intricate tunnels and fanciful chambers, including living quarters, armouries, workshops, kitchens for the preparation of humanoid flesh, and baroque dining halls.
points_of_interest.inhabitants: 200 purple sprites with a murderous, carnivorous nature instilled by Queen Arda
secrets: Behind a tiny locked door at the heart of the mound is Arda's treasure chamber, containing three rubies of increasing sizes (50gp, 100gp, 500gp), a human-sized necklace of fairy silver, bearing the Harrowmoor family crest (1,200gp), and 450 tiny platinum coins stamped with Queen Arda's dour visage (each worth 5sp)

npcs.name: Queen Arda
npcs.title: Sprite Ruler
npcs.description: A purple sprite woman with orange, insectoid eyes and drifting hair of pure white. A tyrant obsessed with her prophetic dreams of ruling all Dolmenwood. Tells her subjects that "big folk" are marauding giants who must be slain for the sake of the realm.
possessions: A tiny (2″) brass Wand of Confusion (3 charges)
npcs.stat_reference: Purple sprite (DMB) with the ability to cast the following arcane spells once a day each: Glyph of Sealing, Vapours of Dream, Ventriloquism

items.name: Giant Flower Petals
items.description: If a giant flower petal is placed in boiling water within 1 day of being picked, the resulting tea becomes a sleep draught with the same effect as the flower's scent
items.mechanical_effect: Sleep draught: Save Versus Doom or fall into deep, uninterruptible sleep for 4d4 Turns

dm_notes: If the party lingers: Mortals must Save Versus Doom or fall into a deep, uninterruptible sleep for 4d4 Turns, during which they are haunted by dreams flavoured with the feelings evoked by the flowers. Sprite attack: A party deemed sufficiently weakened by the flowers is ambushed by 30 purple sprites from the Sprite Mound.
